com.navis.framework.persistence.hibernate.customization

Class HibernateMappingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.persistence.hibernate.customization.HibernateMappingUtils

  • public class HibernateMappingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to access hibernate map building. Applications should NOT use these APIs except for testing

      • computeMaxRowSizeForHydratedEntities

        public static int computeMaxRowSizeForHydratedEntities(java.util.List<java.lang.Class> inEntitiesClasses)
        This method computes maximum possible size of a row for all fields in the entity classes list. This is handy in case of full hydrated query row size evaluation.
        Parameters:
        inEntitiesClasses - entities classes
        Returns:
        maximum row size in bytes

      • getColumnObject

        @Nullable
public static org.hibernate.mapping.Column getColumnObject(org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration inConfig,
                                                                      org.hibernate.metadata.ClassMetadata inMetaData,
                                                                      java.lang.String inPropertyName)
        This method returns Hibernate Column Object if found. If not found, returns null
        Parameters:
        inConfig - configuration
        inMetaData - - class metadata for the table
        inPropertyName - - name of the property defining the column
        Returns:
        column object

      • getColumnSize

        public static int getColumnSize(org.hibernate.mapping.Column inColumnObject,
                                int inDefaultSize)
        Parameters:
        inColumnObject - hibernate column object
        inDefaultSize - - the default size. If the definition has no length, the method will return default value
        Returns:
        it's size

        Parameters:
        inProperty - get column corresponding to given property
        Returns:
        primary column Only single column properties are supported.

      • isDynamicComponent

        public static boolean isDynamicComponent(@NotNull
                                         org.hibernate.type.Type inType)
        Parameters:
        inType - hibernate type
        Returns:
        true if type represents a hibernate dynamic component

      • getMaxRowSizeFromHibernate

        @NotNull
public static java.lang.Integer getMaxRowSizeFromHibernate(@NotNull
                                                                     MetafieldIdList inMfList,
                                                                     @NotNull
                                                                     IMetafieldDictionary inMetafieldDictionary)
        This method is relevant for sqlserver only, but it is fast and used by unit tests only so far. So we can neglect extra computation for other database types
        Parameters:
        inMfList - fields to calculate max size
        inMetafieldDictionary - dictionary
        Returns:
        max row size in bytes

      • getMaxBytesForJavaType

        public static int getMaxBytesForJavaType(java.lang.Class inDataTypeClass,
                                         java.lang.Integer inMaxLength)
        This method returns max bytes to store a Java type in the database
        Parameters:
        inDataTypeClass - database class
        inMaxLength - max lenth
        Returns:
        max bytes

      • getQualifiedTables

        public static java.util.List<org.hibernate.mapping.Table> getQualifiedTables(java.util.List<java.lang.String> inExclude)
        This method returns list of tables for index management system. It excludes views and excepted tables
        Parameters:
        inExclude - of table names to exclude
        Returns:
        list of tables
